en: Narrator: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig have been tidying the house.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈和猪爸爸一直在整理房子。

en: Daddy Pig: Mummy Pig and I found this old box in the attic.
cn: 猪爸爸：猪妈妈和我在阁楼上发现了这个旧箱子。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig and I found this old box in the attic.
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸和我在阁楼上发现了这个旧箱子。

examples.en: Daddy Pig and I found this old book in the car.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸和我在车里发现了这本旧书

examples.en: Daddy Pig and I found this old toy in the basement.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸和我在地下室发现了这个旧玩具

en: Peppa Pig and George: Ooo!
cn: 小猪佩奇和乔治：哦！

en: Daddy Pig: Can anyone guess what’s inside?
cn: 猪爸爸：有人能猜到里面是什么吗？

sentence.cn: 有人能猜到里面是什么吗？

examples.en: Can anyone guess what’s in the box?
examples.cn: 有人能猜到箱子里有什么吗？

examples.en: Can anyone guess what’s under the bed?
examples.cn: 有人能猜到床下有什么吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Hmmm? Nope.
cn: 小猪佩奇：嗯？不知道。

en: Mummy Pig: It’s full of musical instruments.
cn: 猪妈妈：里面全是乐器。

en: Peppa Pig and George: Wow!
cn: 小猪佩奇和乔治：哇！

en: Daddy Pig: They are a bit old and dusty.
cn: 猪爸爸：它们有点旧，还有灰尘。

en: Mummy Pig: This is the violin I used to play when I was little.
cn: 猪妈妈：这是我小时候拉的小提琴。

sentence.en: This is the violin I used to play when I was little.
sentence.cn: 这是我小时候拉的小提琴。

examples.en: This is the guitar I used to play when I was young.
examples.cn: 这是我年轻时弹的吉他。

examples.en: This is the piano I used to play when I was a child.
examples.cn: 这是我小时候弹的钢琴。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, can you play your violin?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，你会拉小提琴吗？

en: Mummy Pig: I haven’t played it for a long time.
cn: 猪妈妈：我很久没拉了。

sentence.en: I haven’t played it for a long time.

examples.en: I haven’t played the piano for a long time.
examples.cn: 我很久没弹钢琴了。

examples.en: I haven’t kicked a football for a long time.
examples.cn: 我很久没踢足球了。

en: Peppa Pig: Please, Mummy. Please play it.
cn: 小猪佩奇：求你了，妈妈，拉一下吧。

en: Mummy Pig: I hope I haven’t forgotten how.
cn: 猪妈妈：希望我没忘记怎么拉。

sentence.en: I hope I haven’t forgotten how.
sentence.cn: 我希望我没忘记怎么拉。

examples.en: I hope I haven’t forgotten how to ride a bike.
examples.cn: 我希望我没忘记怎么骑自行车。

examples.en: I hope I haven’t forgotten how to cook this dish.
examples.cn: 我希望我没忘记怎么做这道菜。

en: Daddy Pig: Bravo!
cn: 猪爸爸：太棒了！

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 小猪佩奇：万岁！

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, can I play the violin?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我可以拉小提琴吗？

en: Mummy Pig: Hold it like this.
cn: 猪妈妈：这样拿着。

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, Mummy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好的，妈妈。

en: Daddy Pig and Mummy Pig: Oh!
cn: 猪爸爸和猪妈妈：哦！

en: Narrator: Oh, dear. I do not think it is meant to sound like that.
cn: 旁白：哎呀，应该不是这个声音。

sentence.en: I do not think it is meant to sound like that.
sentence.cn: 我觉得应该不是这个声音。

examples.en: I do not think it is meant to look like that.
examples.cn: 我觉得应该不是这个样子。

examples.en: I do not think it is meant to taste like that.
examples.cn: 我觉得应该不是这个味道。

en: Narrator: George wants to try.
cn: 旁白：乔治也想试试。

en: Peppa Pig: Hold it like this, George.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，这样拿着。

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig and Peppa Pig: Oh!
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈和小猪佩奇：哦！

en: Narrator: That does not sound quite right either.
cn: 旁白：这个声音也不太对。

sentence.en: That does not sound quite right either.

examples.en: That does not look quite right either.
examples.cn: 这个样子也不太对。

examples.en: That does not taste quite right either.
examples.cn: 这个味道也不太对。

en: Peppa Pig: The violin is too hard to play.
cn: 小猪佩奇：小提琴太难拉了。

sentence.en: The violin is too hard to play.

examples.en: The guitar is too hard to play.
examples.cn: 吉他太难弹了。

examples.en: The yo-yo is too hard to play.
examples.cn: 悠悠球太难玩了。

en: Daddy Pig: Peppa, maybe you’d do better with this tin drum.
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇，也许你玩这个小鼓会更好。

sentence.en: Peppa, maybe you’d do better with this tin drum.
sentence.cn: 佩奇，也许你玩这个小鼓会更好。

examples.en: Peppa, maybe you’d do better with this toy car.
examples.cn: 佩奇，也许你玩这个玩具车会更好。

examples.en: Peppa, maybe you’d do better with this puzzle.
examples.cn: 佩奇，也许你玩这个拼图会更好。

en: Peppa Pig: Thank you, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：谢谢你，爸爸。

en: Narrator: That sounds better. Peppa loves playing the drum.
cn: 旁白：这个声音好多了。佩奇喜欢打鼓。

en: Mummy Pig: Lovely.
cn: 猪妈妈：真好听。

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, it sounds very nice.
cn: 猪爸爸：是的，声音很好听。

en: Mummy Pig: This is Daddy Pig’s old accordion.
cn: 猪妈妈：这是猪爸爸以前的手风琴。

en: Daddy Pig: I used to play this to Mummy Pig when we first met.
cn: 猪爸爸：我和猪妈妈刚认识时经常给她弹这个。

sentence.en: I used to play this to Mummy Pig when we first met.
sentence.cn: 我和猪妈妈刚认识时经常给她弹这个。

examples.en: I used to play this song to Mummy Pig when we first met.
examples.cn: 我和猪妈妈刚认识时经常给她唱这首歌。

examples.en: I used to play this game with Mummy Pig when we first met.
examples.cn: 我和猪妈妈刚认识时经常和她玩这个游戏。

en: Mummy Pig: Oh, Daddy Pig. You remember this tune.
cn: 猪妈妈：哦，猪爸爸，你还记得这首曲子。

examples.en: You remember this song.
examples.cn: 你还记得这首歌。

examples.en: You remember this story.
examples.cn: 你还记得这个故事。

en: Narrator: George wants to play the accordion too.
cn: 旁白：乔治也想弹手风琴。

en: Daddy Pig: Are you sure, George? The accordion is quite difficult.
cn: 猪爸爸：你确定吗，乔治？手风琴很难弹的。

examples.en: The ukelele is quite difficult.
examples.cn: 尤克里里很难弹。

examples.en: The piano is quite difficult.
examples.cn: 钢琴很难弹。

en: Peppa Pig: George, the “accrodion” is almost as difficult to play as my drum.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，手风琴和我的鼓一样难弹。

points.en: almost as difficult to play as my drum

en: Daddy Pig: Okay, George.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，乔治。

en: Narrator: Maybe George is a bit too little to play the accordion.
cn: 旁白：也许乔治还太小，弹不了手风琴。

sentence.en: Maybe George is a bit too little to play the accordion.
sentence.cn: 也许乔治还太小，弹不了手风琴。

examples.en: Maybe Peppa is a bit too little to ride a bike.
examples.cn: 也许佩奇还太小，骑不了自行车。

examples.en: Maybe Suzy is a bit too little to play football.
examples.cn: 也许苏茜还太小，踢不了足球。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, what other instruments are in the box?
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，箱子里还有什么乐器？

sentence.en: Daddy, what other instruments are in the box?
sentence.cn: 爸爸，箱子里还有什么乐器？

examples.en: Daddy, what other toys are in the box?
examples.cn: 爸爸，箱子里还有什么玩具？

examples.en: Daddy, what other books are on the shelf?
examples.cn: 爸爸，架子上还有什么书？

en: Daddy Pig: Just this horn.
cn: 猪爸爸：只有这个号了。

en: Peppa Pig: Can I try?
cn: 小猪佩奇：我可以试试吗？

examples.en: Can I try the drum?
examples.cn: 我可以试试鼓吗？

examples.en: Can I try the guitar?
examples.cn: 我可以试试吉他吗？

en: Daddy Pig: You have to blow it very hard.
cn: 猪爸爸：你要用力吹。

en: Narrator: That does not sound right.
cn: 旁白：这个声音不对。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s impossible.
cn: 小猪佩奇：太难了。

examples.en: It’s impossible to climb that mountain.
examples.cn: 爬那座山是不可能的。

examples.en: It’s impossible to finish this puzzle.
examples.cn: 完成这个拼图是不可能的。

en: Mummy Pig: I think I used to be able to play it.
cn: 猪妈妈：我记得我以前会吹。

sentence.en: I used to be able to play it.

examples.en: I used to be able to ride a bike.
examples.cn: 我以前会骑自行车。

examples.en: I used to be able to swim.
examples.cn: 我以前会游泳。

en: Narrator: That really does not sound right.
cn: 旁白：这个声音真的不对。

en: Daddy Pig: Maybe it just needs someone big and strong like me.
cn: 猪爸爸：也许需要像我这样强壮的人来吹。

en: Narrator: That does not sound right either.
cn: 旁白：这个声音也不对。

en: Daddy Pig: Peppa’s right. It is impossible to play.
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇说得对，这个真的吹不响。

en: Mummy Pig: Never mind, Daddy Pig. Just stick to the accordion. You play it beautifully.
cn: 猪妈妈：没关系，猪爸爸。还是弹手风琴吧，你弹得很棒。

en: Daddy Pig: Well, I do play it quite nicely, even if I say so myself.
cn: 猪爸爸：嗯，我弹得确实不错，自己都这么觉得。

points.en: even if I say so myself

en: Mummy Pig: And I’ll play my violin.
cn: 猪妈妈：我来拉小提琴。

en: Peppa Pig: And I’ll play my drum.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我来打鼓。

en: Narrator: Mummy Pig plays the violin.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈拉小提琴。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig plays the accordion.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸弹手风琴。

en: Narrator: Peppa plays the drum.
cn: 旁白：佩奇打鼓。

en: Narrator: But what instrument will George play?
cn: 旁白：那乔治会玩什么乐器呢？

en: Narrator: George is blowing the horn.
cn: 旁白：乔治在吹号。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy couldn’t play the horn. And Daddy couldn’t play it. And even I couldn’t play it. But George can play it.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈不会吹号，爸爸也不会，连我都不会，但乔治会。

sentence.en: And even I couldn’t play it.

examples.en: And even I couldn’t ride a bike.
examples.cn: 连我都不会骑自行车。

examples.en: And even I couldn’t walk on my hands.
examples.cn: 连我都不会倒立走路。
